inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Add otoscopy; occlusion effect test.
V1: Missing occlusion effect test.
V1 SRT: Left/right swapped; should be Right 40, Left 35 dB HL.
Data: Missing SII pre/post values.

logic_summary: Added Otoscopy and Occlusion effect test to ordered_list.
Corrected swapped SRT values (Right 40, Left 35) in V1.
Added SII pre/post values to REM result summaries in V1 based on Figures 58.2 and 58.4.
Added Occlusion effect test as a distinct test entry in V1.

value.rationale_short: Visual inspection of the ear canal and tympanic membrane.
Assess potential occlusion effect with closed domes.

patch_ops.value: SRTs consistent with pure-tone averages (R 40, L 35 dB HL); WRS showed slight difficulty (R 80%, L 84% at 65 dB HL).
Pre-adjustment: Significant under-amplification relative to DSL v5.0 targets, particularly >2000 Hz. SII (Left): Soft 27, Avg 47, Loud 64.
Post-adjustment (with closed domes): Improved high-frequency audibility matching DSL v5.0 targets; occlusion effect test showed no issues. SII (Left): Soft 45, Avg 71, Loud 79.

value.name: Occlusion effect test
value.result_summary: No significant occlusion effect measured objectively or reported subjectively.
